reviews.customers_say: Customers love the style of this sweater. However, the fit and quality receive mixed feedback, with some saying it fits great while others find it weird, and some describe it as a bad quality sweater. Moreover, the size runs very big according to multiple reviews. Additionally, the material quality receives negative feedback, with customers describing it as cheap.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite top I’ve owned in years
items.body: A year ago I gained a good amount of weight due to a medication I was on. I didn’t know how to dress for my new size so when I found this top I fell in love! I wear it at least once a week. It’s soft and versatile, easy to dress up or down. I’m buying a new one because the knit has pulled a little which doesn’t surprise me since I wear it so often. You can show just one shoulder or both, but the best part for me is that it hides my tummy where I carry the most weight. I’m a size 18 and the XXL fits perfectly. Also, I wouldn’t put it in the dryer. I wash it cold on normal and let it air dry, it dries really fast. Read more
items.author: Abby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the look
items.body: Good size sexy fun Read more
items.author: Friday

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't go off the shoulders like the photo
items.body: Love everything about this top other then the fact it doesn't go off the shoulders like seen in the photo Read more
items.author: Leah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars RUNS BIG!
items.body: Runs very big. Based on measurements it should have fit. I could not believe the unexpected size difference. It is going back. Read more
items.author: Colleen Dawson

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not flowy as pictured
items.body: I liked the style but it’s not as loose as pictured Read more
items.author: Kayla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater
items.body: Love love this sweater fits great bought to wear on birthday dinner with my fiance. He really loved the way it looked on me Read more
items.author: kirsten hendon

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nothing like the picture
items.body: The color isn't as deep as it is in the picture and the material isn't as flowy. Cheap material and the neckline isn't as shown in the pic. All around cheap looking,will be sending it back. Deeply disappointed Read more
items.author: Saunnie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Maroon, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Solid Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
